messages.title: ABOUT ROBERT
messages.content: First elected in 2005, Robert's family have farmed near Malton for over 150 years. Married to Maureen, they have three grown-up children. He has served in Government, most recently as Minister of State for Agriculture, Fisheries and Food.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The £12 million redevelopment of Whitby Hospital has the green light - banishing fears of closure. New services will include an extra care facility.

Scarborough Hospital's long-term future is also secure. Accident and Emergency will be transformed with a £40 million Combined Emergency Assessment Unit. This innovation will bring medical and surgical services to the front door.

issues.health: WHITBY HOSPITAL'S FUTURE IS SECURE - The £12 million redevelopment of Whitby Hospital... New services will include an extra care facility. MAJOR INVESTMENT AT SCARBOROUGH HOSPITAL - Scarborough Hospital's long-term future is also secure... a £40 million Combined Emergency Assessment Unit.

politicalExperience.role: Minister of State for Agriculture, Fisheries and Food
